member.name: T:Litium.Foundation.Modules.CMS.WebControls.TreeView.PageNodeRad
member.summary: PageNodeRad.
Creates a page node
member.param: Whether to show files or not.
Drop and drag is enabled for TreeView.
Whether the pages that can not be master page will be enabled in the tree or not.
Whether the pages that can not be original page for translation pages will be enabled in the tree or not.
Whether to force read permission check or not.
Whether to force write permission check or not.
Parent page type id of the shared page type. To check whether the shared page can be child of its parent page.

Whether the parent page is master page and shares structure. To check whether the translation page can be a page with page type that can not be a master page. It's not allowed to create those pages under a parent page that is master page and shares structure.
A hashtable with flag paths for websites in the module. Website id is the key.
Shown as tool tip for nodes that are grayed out as master page. An unpublished page can not be a master page.
Shown as tool tip for nodes that are grayed out as master page. Page type of the page can not be master page.
Shown as tool tip for nodes that are grayed out as master/translation original page. A shared page can neither be a master page nor a translation original page.
Shown as tool tip for nodes that are grayed out as master/translation original page. Page can not be child of the selected parent page.
Shown as tool tip for nodes that are grayed out as translation original page. Parent page is a master page that shares its structure but this page can not be a master page.
if set to true [is context menu].
member.returns: The new tree node.

member.name: T:Litium.Foundation.Modules.CMS.WebControls.SearchField
member.summary: Renders a search field. The resultpage is static and entered in ResultPageUrl or dynamic using internal link property from current page. Control is implementing customizable throught the LayoutTemplate, se example.
member.remarks:
If the internal link property should be from another page, place the SearchField in UsePage-control.
The TextBox should have ID SearchField. The Button should have ID SearchButton and a type of ASP:Button, ASP:ImageButton, ASP:LinkButton or button html-element.

member.name: T:Litium.Foundation.Modules.CMS.WebControls.TreeView.PageNode
member.summary: PageNode.
Creates a page node
member.param: Whether to show files or not.
Drop and drag is enabled for TreeView.
Whether the pages that can not be master page will be enabled in the tree or not.
Whether the pages that can not be original page for translation pages will be enabled in the tree or not.
Whether to force read permission check or not.
Whether to force write permission check or not.
Parent page type id of the shared page type. To check whether the shared page can be child of its parent page.

Whether the parent page is master page and shares structure. To check whether the translation page can be a page with page type that can not be a master page. It's not allowed to create those pages under a parent page that is master page and shares structure.
A hashtable with flag paths for websites in the module. Website id is the key.
Shown as tool tip for nodes that are grayed out as master page. An unpublished page can not be a master page.
Shown as tool tip for nodes that are grayed out as master page. Page type of the page can not be master page.
Shown as tool tip for nodes that are grayed out as master/translation original page. A shared page can neither be a master page nor a translation original page.
Shown as tool tip for nodes that are grayed out as master/translation original page. Page can not be child of the selected parent page.
Shown as tool tip for nodes that are grayed out as translation original page. Parent page is a master page that shares its structure but this page can not be a master page.
member.returns: The new tree node.

member.summary: Creates a page node
member.param: Whether to show files or not.

Whether the pages that can not be original page for translation pages will be enabled in the tree or not.

Whether to force write permission check or not.
Parent page type id of the shared page type. To check whether the shared page can be child of its parent page.

A hashtable with flag paths for websites in the module. Website id is the key.
Shown as tool tip for nodes that are grayed out as master page. An unpublished page can not be a master page.

Shown as tool tip for nodes that are grayed out as master/translation original page. A product catalog page can neither be a master page nor a translation original page.
Shown as tool tip for nodes that are grayed out as master/translation original page. A shared page can neither be a master page nor a translation original page.
Shown as tool tip for nodes that are grayed out as master/translation original page. Page can not be child of the selected parent page.

member.summary:
Gets the current order discount carrier. Depending on the repeater, this property may expose following:
A Order row discount, wrapped as a Order Discount Carrier, if inside a OrderRowRepeater.
A Order campaign discount, wrapped as a Order Discount Carrier, if inside a CampaignDiscountRepeater.
A Order Discount Carrier, if inside a Order Discount Repeater.

member.name: T:Litium.Foundation.Modules.ECommerce.WebControls.OrderRowProductFinalPrice
member.summary: Renders the order row product final price.
member.remarks:
This control displays the final price. Based on whether a campaign is present or not, calculation differs.
If a campaign is present the calculation is: OrderRow.UnitCampaignPrice x OrderRow.Quantity - OrderRow.TotalDiscountAmount
If there is no campaign then the calculation is: OrderRow.UnitListPrice x OrderRow.Quantity - OrderRow.TotalDiscountAmount
Note that prices shown will be either with or without VAT based on the property.

member.name: T:Litium.Foundation.Modules.ECommerce.WebControls.OrderRowProductListPrice
member.summary: Renders the order row product list price.
member.remarks:
This controls renders the amount in if the property is set to false. If show with Vat, it renders the amount according to following formula.
OrderRowCarrier.UnitListPrice x (1 + OrderRowCarrier.VATPercentage)

member.name: T:Litium.Foundation.Modules.ECommerce.WebControls.OrderTotalDiscount
member.summary: Renders the order total discount.
member.remarks:
This is the . The value in this property may change based on the OrderTotalCalculator in pricing rules plugin implementation.
In the default plugin implementation, this value is calculated as:
OrderCarrier.TotalDiscount = Sum of all s in the property .
This means, in the default implementation, this property will NOT include following discounts.
